title: [IDEA] Diff highlighting for edits (like Claude Code)

logs.msg: Feature: When displaying file edits, show diff with syntax highlighting like Claude Code. Green for additions (brighter green for specific added text), dim red for deletions (brighter red for specific removed text). Use 'similar' crate for diff computation, ansi-to-tui or custom styling for display. Should work for Edit tool results and file write confirmations.
